name: Organizational Name Type
description: Codes specifying the type or classification of an organizational name for proper identification and context

values.definition: Alternative or alias name for the organization
Official legal name as registered with government authorities
Name used for stock exchange trading purposes

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal organizational categorization
vendorVariations.cerner: Standard implementation with validation for common organization types

generationRules.realistic: Legal names most common for healthcare organizations, display names for user interfaces, aliases for known-as names
